Key Match Events: Wales vs Turkey ended in a 0-0 draw
Turkey's Baris Alper Yilmaz was sent off after receiving a second yellow card
Wales had several chances to score, but were unable to find the breakthrough
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy began his Wales reign with a highly anticipated match against Turkey
Bellamy's attention to detail and passion for the job were highlighted as key aspects of his approach
Post-Match Reflections: Bellamy expressed satisfaction with the performance, despite the lack of a goal
The draw was seen as a positive start to the Bellamy era
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was marked by a frenetic and entertaining first half
Wales' captain Aaron Ramsey had a chance to score early in the match
Turkey's Hakan Calhanoglu was introduced as a substitute in the second half
Others: Wales will look to build on this performance in their next match against Montenegro
The match was played at the Cardiff City Stadium
The draw was seen as a well-earned point for Wales
